definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: But as you know, for you own vision is not something that you reason about.
sentences.chinese: 但是，众所周之，我们对于视觉本不需要推理。

sentences.english: What are the non-visual qualities of the design?
sentences.chinese: 什么是非视觉的设计特点？

sentences.english: The three-dimensional object recognition is an important topic in computer vision research.
sentences.chinese: 三维物体识别是计算机视觉研究的一项重要课题。

sentences.english: An approach of grading fertile eggs based on computer vision was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种利用计算机视觉对种蛋进行筛选的方法。

sentences.english: They may even use their visual areas for other thought processes.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能甚至把他们的视觉区域用于其他思维过程。

sentences.english: I still use sketching to try out different elements of look and feel.
sentences.chinese: 我还在用草图来试验视觉效果方面的不同元素。

sentences.english: Also, it would be best to stick with darker stripes, because contrasting colors add more depth.
sentences.chinese: 暗条纹也是个绝佳之选，因为对比色会增加视觉深度。

sentences.english: The colorized vision system is mainly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍彩色视觉系统的设计与实现。

sentences.english: This is a visual effect that shows the picture disappearing to indicate that the picture has been deleted.
sentences.chinese: 这种视觉效果显示照片消失的过程，表示已经删除它。

sentences.english: Bar codes, character recognition, machine vision.
sentences.chinese: 条码，字元识别，机器视觉。

sentences.english: Visual beauty of poetry is very important in modern poetry.
sentences.chinese: 诗的视觉美在现代诗歌中十分重要。

sentences.english: Using computer vision technology, the model for fresh level of duck eggs was studied.
sentences.chinese: 用计算机视觉技术，研究了鸭蛋新鲜度模型。

sentences.english: Do the process instructions reference available visual aids?
sentences.chinese: 工序说明引用了有效的视觉教具了吗？

sentences.english: In this paper, the binocular stereovision is applied to orientating red tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 运用双目立体视觉技术对红色番茄进行定位。

sentences.english: Design your own card paper with the help of a visual artist in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 设计你的视觉艺术家帮助自己的纸卡在此免费视频。

sentences.english: On weekends, I'll catch the morning movie for my visual enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 在周末时，俺都去看早场电影，享受视觉飨宴喜悦。

definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
the feeling of actually being there
